item.title: Building a Project Management Tool: Django CRUD with PostgreSQL and ETL Integration
item.description:
Project Overview
#

Managing infrastructure projects involves tracking countless moving parts—budgets, timelines, resources, and stakeholder updates. Traditional spreadsheet-based tracking quickly becomes unwieldy as projects scale. This led me to develop a Django-based CRUD application that centralizes project data management with robust backend storage and automated data processing capabilities.

The system combines Django’s powerful ORM, PostgreSQL’s reliability, and Pentaho Kettle’s ETL capabilities to create a comprehensive project management solution that enhances data integrity and streamlines decision-making processes.
